titleStmt.title: Proclamation against selling of ships.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Hampton Court the 15. day of October, in the second yeere of our reigne ...
Against selling ships to foreigners. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
